text: The Shepherds Flat Wind Farm is an 845 megawatt (MW) wind farm in the eastern part of U.S. state of Oregon, near Arlington, in both Gilliam and Morrow counties. Building started in 2009, and it officially opened in September 2012. ==Related pages== *Fowler Ridge Wind Farm *Wind power ==References== Category:Wind farms Category:Buildings and structures in Oregon
title: Shepherds Flat Wind Farm
